summary: An ordinance relating to the improvement of 40th Ave. Southwest from Southwest 98th St. to Southwest 102nd St.; and certain other streets, avenues, easements and alleys, by constructing a sanitary sewer system together with pumping stations and force mains as may be required, and otherwise improving the same, Local Improvement District No. 6299, and appropriating money from the Sewer Fund in aid thereof as a loan.
